description: This file defines a LightningJS component called 'Loader' that displays an animated loading indicator composed of three circles that fade in and out in sequence.

classes.name: Loader
classes.description: A LightningJS component for showing a loading animation with fading circles.

methods.name: start
methods.description: Initiates an interval that toggles the alpha value between 0 and 1 to animate the fade in/out of circles.
